name: STBL Gold
description: STBLG is a gold-backed token that brings real-world assets on-chain with full transparency and redeemability. Each STBL Gold (STBLG) token represents one ounce of fully allocated, fully reserved physical metal. The project enables on-chain trading, settlement, and redemption, providing a bridge between traditional precious metals and blockchain-native finance. STBL operates with institutional-grade compliance and offers a scalable foundation for tokenized real asset infrastructure.
